name: Mass Effect 3 DLC File
summary: Learn about .SFAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SFAR files can be opened using the DLC Editor included with ME3 Explorer (Tools â†’ DLC Editor). With the program, you can extract files such as .PCC, .AFC, .BIK, and other game files.

description: Game data file used by Mass Effect 3, a first person role-playing game set in outer space; stores DLC (downloadable content) used for extending the game with new content and features.
